patthana2.12:62.1_0: Kileso ca nokileso ca dhammā kilesassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā
patthana2.12:62.1_1: purimā kilesā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ kilesānaṁ anantarapaccayena
patthana2.12:62.1_2: paccayo. (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Purimā purimā kilesā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimānaṁ
patthana2.12:62.1_3: pacchimānaṁ nokilesānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo; kilesā ca sampayuttakā
patthana2.12:62.1_4: ca khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Purimā purimā
patthana2.12:62.1_5: kilesā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ kilesānaṁ sampayuttakānañca
patthana2.12:63.1: Samanantarapaccayena paccayo, sahajātapaccayena paccayo, aññamaññapaccayena paccayo, nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:64.1_0: Kileso dhammo kilesassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana2.12:64.1_1: anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe…. **Pakatūpanissayo**—kilesā kilesānaṁ upanissayapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.12:65.1_0: Nokileso dhammo nokilesassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana2.12:65.1_2: deti …pe… mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti; sīlaṁ …pe… paññaṁ … rāgaṁ … dosaṁ … mohaṁ
patthana2.12:65.1_3: … mānaṁ … diṭṭhiṁ … patthanaṁ … kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ …pe… senāsanaṁ upanissāya dānaṁ deti
patthana2.12:65.1_4: …pe… saṅghaṁ bhindati; saddhā …pe… senāsanaṁ saddhāya …pe… phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:66.1_0: Nokileso dhammo kilesassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana2.12:66.1_2: jappeti … diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti; sīlaṁ …pe… senāsanaṁ upanissāya pāṇaṁ hanati …pe… saṅghaṁ
patthana2.12:66.1_3: bhindati; saddhā …pe… senāsanaṁ kilesānaṁ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:67.1_0: Nokileso dhammo kilesassa ca nokilesassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana2.12:67.1_2: jappeti … diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti; sīlaṁ …pe… senāsanaṁ upanissāya pāṇaṁ hanati …pe… saṅghaṁ
patthana2.12:67.1_3: bhindati; saddhā …pe… senāsanaṁ kilesānaṁ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:68.1: Kileso ca nokileso ca dhammā kilesassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.12:69.1_0: Nokileso dhammo nokilesassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana2.12:69.1_2: uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti. Rūpāyatanaṁ
patthana2.12:69.1_4: cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa …pe… vatthu nokilesānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana2.12:70.1_0: Nokileso dhammo kilesassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana2.12:70.1_2: taṁ ārabbha rāgo …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati. **Vatthupurejātaṁ**—vatthu kilesānaṁ
patthana2.12:71.1_0: Nokileso dhammo kilesassa ca nokilesassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana2.12:71.1_2: taṁ ārabbha kilesā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. **Vatthupurejātaṁ**—vatthu
patthana2.12:72.1: Kileso dhammo nokilesassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.12:73.1: Nokileso dhammo nokilesassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.12:74.1: Kileso ca nokileso ca dhammā nokilesassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo (saṅkhittaṁ) āsevanapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.12:75.1_0: Nokileso dhammo nokilesassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.12:75.1_3: khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:76.1: Nokileso dhammo kilesassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—nokilesā cetanā kilesānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:77.1_0: Nokileso dhammo kilesassa ca nokilesassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— nokilesā
patthana2.12:77.1_1: cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kilesānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:78.1_0: Nokileso dhammo nokilesassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ … āhārapaccayena
patthana2.12:78.1_1: paccayo … tīṇi … indriyapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … jhānapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi
patthana2.12:78.1_2: … maggapaccayena paccayo … nava … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.12:79.1: Kileso dhammo nokilesassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.12:80.1: Nokileso dhammo nokilesassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.12:81.1: Nokileso dhammo kilesassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. **Purejātaṁ**—vatthu kilesānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:82.1: Nokileso dhammo kilesassa ca nokilesassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. **Purejātaṁ**—vatthu kilesānaṁ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:83.1: Kileso ca nokileso ca dhammā nokilesassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Vitthāretabbaṁ.)
patthana2.12:84.1: Kileso dhammo kilesassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ. (Paṭiccasadisaṁ.)
patthana2.12:85.1: Kileso dhammo nokilesassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.12:86.1: Kileso dhammo kilesassa ca nokilesassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (Paṭiccasadisaṁ.)
patthana2.12:87.1: Nokileso dhammo nokilesassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.12:88.1: Nokileso dhammo kilesassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sahajātaṁ sahajātasadisaṁ, purejātaṁ purejātasadisaṁ.)
patthana2.12:89.1: Nokileso dhammo kilesassa ca nokilesassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ (sahajātaṁ sahajātasadisaṁ, purejātaṁ purejātasadisaṁ.)
patthana2.12:90.1_0: Kileso ca nokileso ca dhammā kilesassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.12:90.1_1: purejātaṁ. **Sahajāto**—lobho ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā mohassa, diṭṭhiyā, thinassa,
patthana2.12:90.1_3: ca vatthu ca mohassa, diṭṭhiyā, thinassa, uddhaccassa, ahirikassa, anottappassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (Cakkaṁ.)
patthana2.12:91.1_0: Kileso ca nokileso ca dhammā nokilesassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.12:91.1_1: purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. **Sahajāto**—nokileso eko khandho ca kileso
patthana2.12:91.1_2: ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.12:91.1_3: dve khandhā ca …pe…. **Sahajātā**—kilesā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ
patthana2.12:91.1_4: atthipaccayena paccayo. **Sahajātā**—kilesā ca vatthu ca nokilesānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena
patthana2.12:91.1_5: paccayo. **Pacchājātā**—kilesā ca sampayuttakā khandhā ca purejātassa imassa kāyassa
patthana2.12:91.1_6: atthipaccayena paccayo. **Pacchājātā**—kilesā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā kabaḷīkāro
patthana2.12:91.1_7: āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. **Pacchājātā**—kilesā ca sampayuttakā
patthana2.12:91.1_8: ca khandhā rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:92.1_0: Kileso ca nokileso ca dhammā kilesassa ca nokilesassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena
patthana2.12:92.1_1: paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ. **Sahajāto**—nokileso eko khandho ca lobho ca tiṇṇannaṁ
patthana2.12:92.1_2: khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ mohassa ca, diṭṭhiyā, thinassa, uddhaccassa,
patthana2.12:92.1_3: ahirikassa, anottappassa atthipaccayena paccayo …pe… dve khandhā ca …pe…. **Sahajāto**—lobho
patthana2.12:92.1_4: ca vatthu ca mohassa, diṭṭhiyā, thinassa, uddhaccassa, ahirikassa, anottappassa sampayuttakānañca
patthana2.12:93.1: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:94.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava,
patthana2.12:94.1_1: sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte
patthana2.12:94.1_2: tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi,
patthana2.12:94.1_3: magge nava, sampayutte nava, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
patthana2.12:95.1: Kileso dhammo kilesassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:96.1: Kileso dhammo nokilesassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:97.1: Kileso dhammo kilesassa ca nokilesassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:98.1_0: Nokileso dhammo nokilesassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena
patthana2.12:98.1_1: paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena
patthana2.12:98.1_2: paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:99.1: Nokileso dhammo kilesassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:100.1: Nokileso dhammo kilesassa ca nokilesassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:101.1: Kileso ca nokileso ca dhammā kilesassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:102.1: Kileso ca nokileso ca dhammā nokilesassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:103.1: Kileso ca nokileso ca dhammā kilesassa ca nokilesassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:104.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.12:105.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare cattāri, nasamanantare
patthana2.12:105.1_1: cattāri, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cattāri (sabbattha cattāri), nasampayutte
patthana2.12:105.1_2: dve, navippayutte cattāri, nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri.
patthana2.12:106.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (anulomamātikā kātabbā) …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.12:108.1: Saṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (yathā lokiyadukaṁ, evaṁ ninnānākaraṇaṁ.)
patthana2.12:110.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana2.12:111.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— saṅkiliṭṭhe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.12:112.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭho ca asaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ
patthana2.12:112.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana2.12:113.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— asaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ
patthana2.12:113.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.12:113.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe….
patthana2.12:114.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhañca asaṅkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—saṅkiliṭṭhe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.12:115.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte
patthana2.12:115.1_1: pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye pañca, upanissaye dve, purejāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme
patthana2.12:115.1_2: pañca, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre pañca (saṅkhittaṁ), avigate pañca.
patthana2.12:116.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.12:117.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ
patthana2.12:117.1_1: asaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve
patthana2.12:118.1_0: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare
patthana2.12:118.1_1: tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte pañca,
patthana2.12:118.1_2: naāsevane pañca, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne
patthana2.12:118.1_3: ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.12:119.1: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sahajātavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.12:120.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Paṭiccasadisaṁ.)
patthana2.12:121.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— asaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ
patthana2.12:121.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.12:121.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… (yāva ajjhattikā mahābhūtā) vatthuṁ paccayā asaṅkiliṭṭhā khandhā.
patthana2.12:122.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— vatthuṁ paccayā saṅkiliṭṭhā khandhā.
patthana2.12:123.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā saṅkiliṭṭho ca asaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā saṅkiliṭṭhā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.12:124.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhañca asaṅkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṁ paccayā saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe ca …pe….
patthana2.12:125.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhañca asaṅkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṁ paccayā asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—saṅkiliṭṭhe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.12:126.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhañca asaṅkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṁ paccayā saṅkiliṭṭho ca asaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammā
patthana2.12:126.1_1: uppajjanti hetupaccayā—saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā
patthana2.12:126.1_2: …pe… dve khandhe ca …pe… saṅkiliṭṭhe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ
patthana2.12:127.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā nava, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri,
patthana2.12:127.1_1: sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cattāri, nissaye nava, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte cattāri,

patthana2.12:161.1_3: bhindati, rāgo …pe… patthanā rāgassa …pe… patthanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.12:163.1_3: … utuṁ … bhojanaṁ … senāsanaṁ upanissāya dānaṁ deti …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti; saddhā

patthana2.12:166.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)

patthana2.12:168.1_3: paccayo. (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Saṅkiliṭṭhā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca
patthana2.12:169.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.12:169.1_3: cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.12:172.1: Saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.12:173.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.12:174.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. **Purejātaṁ**—vatthu saṅkiliṭṭhānaṁ khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:175.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ. (Paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
patthana2.12:175.1_1: Saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.12:175.1_2: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhassa ca asaṅkiliṭṭhassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena
patthana2.12:176.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.12:176.1_1: purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhassa
patthana2.12:177.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho ca asaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammā saṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.12:177.1_1: purejātaṁ. **Sahajāto**—saṅkiliṭṭho eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana2.12:178.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho ca asaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammā asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.12:178.1_1: pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. **Sahajātā**—saṅkiliṭṭhā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ
patthana2.12:178.1_2: rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. **Pacchājātā**—saṅkiliṭṭhā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro
patthana2.12:178.1_3: āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. **Pacchājātā**—saṅkiliṭṭhā khandhā
patthana2.12:179.1: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:180.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri, samanantare
patthana2.12:180.1_1: cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte
patthana2.12:180.1_2: dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre cattāri, indriye
patthana2.12:180.1_3: cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta,
patthana2.12:180.1_4: natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate satta.

patthana2.12:182.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena
patthana2.12:182.1_1: paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.12:184.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena
patthana2.12:184.1_1: paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena

patthana2.12:188.1_0: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare
patthana2.12:188.1_1: satta, nasahajāte pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, nanissaye pañca, naupanissaye satta,
patthana2.12:188.1_2: napurejāte cha, napacchājāte satta …pe… namagge satta, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte
patthana2.12:188.1_3: cattāri, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.12:189.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare cattāri, nasamanantare
patthana2.12:189.1_1: cattāri, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cattāri …pe… nasampayutte dve, navippayutte
patthana2.12:190.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca (anulomamātikā) …pe… avigate satta.
patthana2.12:192.1: Kilesasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kilesasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—kilesasampayuttaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana2.12:193.1: Kilesasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kilesavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—kilesasampayutte khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.12:196.1: Kilesañceva saṅkilesikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkilesiko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—lobhaṁ paṭicca moho diṭṭhi thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ. (Cakkaṁ.)
patthana2.12:197.1: Kilesañceva saṅkilesikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—kilese paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ.
patthana2.12:198.1_0: Kilesañceva saṅkilesikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkilesiko ca saṅkilesiko
patthana2.12:198.1_1: ceva no ca kileso ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—lobhaṁ paṭicca moho diṭṭhi thinaṁ
patthana2.12:198.1_2: uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ.
patthana2.12:199.1: (Evaṁ paṭiccavāropi sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṁsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi kilesadukasadisā. Ninnānākaraṇaṁ. Āmasanaṁ nānaṁ.)
patthana2.12:200.1_0: Kileso ceva saṅkilesiko ca dhammo kilesassa ceva saṅkilesikassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena
patthana2.12:200.1_1: paccayo—kilesā ceva saṅkilesikā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṁ kilesānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo

patthana2.12:201.1_1: paccayo—kilese ārabbha kilesā uppajjanti. (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Kilese ārabbha saṅkilesikā
patthana2.12:201.1_2: ceva no ca kilesā khandhā uppajjanti. (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Kilese ārabbha kilesā ca

patthana2.12:202.1_1: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ …pe… sīlaṁ …pe… uposathakammaṁ …pe… pubbe suciṇṇāni
patthana2.12:202.1_2: …pe… jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ paccavekkhati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo
patthana2.12:202.1_3: uppajjati …pe… uddhaccaṁ uppajjati, jhāne parihīne vippaṭisārissa domanassaṁ uppajjati;

patthana2.12:202.1_6: passati …pe… āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Itare dve kilesadukasadisā, ghaṭanārammaṇāpi kilesadukasadisā.)

patthana2.12:204.1_2: …pe… sīlaṁ …pe… uposathakammaṁ …pe… pubbe suciṇṇāni …pe… jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ
patthana2.12:204.1_3: garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, sekkhā gotrabhuṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, vodānaṁ garuṁ
patthana2.12:204.1_4: katvā paccavekkhanti; cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ saṅkilesike ceva no ca kilese khandhe

patthana2.12:204.1_6: ceva no ca kilesādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ
patthana2.12:205.1: Kileso ceva saṅkilesiko ca dhammo kilesassa ceva saṅkilesikassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Kilesadukasadisā.)

patthana2.12:206.1_1: anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā saṅkilesikā ceva no ca kilesā khandhā pacchimānaṁ
patthana2.12:206.1_2: pacchimānaṁ saṅkilesikānañceva no ca kilesānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.12:206.1_3: anulomaṁ gotrabhussa … anulomaṁ vodānassa … āvajjanā saṅkilesikānañceva no ca kilesānaṁ
patthana2.12:207.1_0: (Itare dve anantarā kilesadukasadisā, ninnānākaraṇā. Ghaṭanānantarampi sabbe paccayā
patthana2.12:207.1_1: kilesadukasadisā, ninnānākaraṇā. Upanissaye lokuttaraṁ natthi, idaṁ dukaṁ kilesadukasadisaṁ, ninnānākaraṇaṁ.)
patthana2.12:209.1: Kilesañceva saṅkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—lobhaṁ paṭicca moho diṭṭhi thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ. (Cakkaṁ.)
